GGG.F.summary: PT Gudang Garam Tbk produces and sells cigarettes in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through Cigarettes, Paperboards, and Others segments. It offers hand-rolled, machine-made, and klobot clove cigarettes. The company markets its products under the Gudang Garam Family, Surya Family, and GG Family brand names. It is also involved in trading activities. In addition, the company provides non-scheduled air transportation and entertainment services. The company was formerly known as PT Perusahaan Rokok Tjap ÂGudang GaramÂ Kediri. PT Gudang Garam Tbk was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Kediri, Indonesia. PT Gudang Garam Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Suryaduta Investama.

HMSP.JK.summary: PT Hanjaya Mandala Sampoerna Tbk manufactures and trades in cigarettes in Indonesia. The company engages in the general trading, property development, and expedition and warehousing businesses; e-commerce and agency activities; and the provision of leisure and golf services. It sells its products under the Dji Sam Soe, Sampoerna A, Sampoerna Kretek, and Sampoerna U brand names. The company was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia. PT Hanjaya Mandala Sampoerna Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Philip Morris Indonesia.

The company engages in the general trading, property development, and expedition and warehousing businesses; e-commerce and agency activities; and the provision of leisure and golf services. It sells its products under the Dji Sam Soe, Sampoerna A, Sampoerna Kretek, and Sampoerna U brand names. The company was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia. PT Hanjaya Mandala Sampoerna Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Philip Morris Indonesia.

ITIC.JK.summary: PT Indonesian Tobacco Tbk manufactures and sells cigarettes and tobacco in Indonesia. The company processes tobacco leaves into finished products in the form of self-rolled tobacco or tobacco shags. It also exports its products to Singapore, Malaysia, and Japan. The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Malang, Indonesia.

PHJMF.summary: PT Hanjaya Mandala Sampoerna Tbk manufactures and trades in cigarettes in Indonesia. The company engages in the general trading, property development, and expedition and warehousing businesses; e-commerce and agency activities; and the provision of leisure and golf services. It sells its products under the Dji Sam Soe, Sampoerna A, Sampoerna Kretek, and Sampoerna U brand names. The company was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia. PT Hanjaya Mandala Sampoerna Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Philip Morris Indonesia.

RMBA.JK.summary: PT Bentoel Internasional Investama Tbk manufactures and distributes cigarettes in Indonesia and internationally. It offers a range of machine-made kretek, hand-made kretek, and white cigarettes under the Dunhill Filter, Dunhill Mild, Club Mild, Lucky Strike Mild, Neo Mild, Tali Jagat, Bintang Buana, Sejati, Star Mild, Uno Mild, Lucky Strike, Dunhill Regular, Dunhill Lights, and Dunhill Menthol brand names. The company was formerly known as PT Transindo Multi Prima Tbk and changed its name to PT Bentoel Internasional Investama Tbk in August 2000. The company was founded in 1930 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bentoel Internasional Investama Tbk is a subsidiary of British American Tobacco (2009 PCA) Ltd.

WIIM.JK.summary: PT Wismilak Inti Makmur Tbk manufactures and trades in cigarettes in Indonesia. It offers hand-rolled and machine-rolled cigarettes, cigars, and filter rods. The company markets and sells its products under the Galan Kretek, Wismilak Spesial, Wismilak Slim, Wismilak Diplomat, Diplomat Mild, Diplomat Mild Menthol, Wismilak Premium Cigars, and Wismilak Premium Seleccion brands. PT Wismilak Inti Makmur Tbk was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.
